attributes.action: Remove Peter Mandelson from all Government Posts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mandelson has been forced from Government twice for financial impropriety, he is unelected by the people, an associate of a seditious anti-democracy group known as the Bilderbergers and has no place in the Government of this Country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
